name: Chou Aniki: Seinaru Protein Densetsu
summary: Located in the "Holy Land," there exists protein which the legend says that when ingested, it can sculpt the ultimate body. The protein appeared in front of Adon and Samson, asking for protection as it is targeted by the evil builder. Adon and Samson head to the Holy Land to rid the evil from the land and protect the protein.
